Desc.entry: Runs keep fit classes, including classes for women only and people aged 50 years and over.

DisabledAccess.entry: For wheelchair access please telephone prior to arrival

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 9.30-10.30am (yoga-based stretch class), 12.15-1pm (aqua care for older people) 7.30-8.30pm (20/20/20 aerobics), 8.30-9.30pm (aqua aerobics), Tues 7.30-8.30pm (steptacular), Wed 10am-1.30pm (aged 50 plus session), 11am-12noon (women only swimming), 12.15-1pm (aqua care for older people), 8-9pm (aqua aerobics), Thurs 8.30-9.30pm (yoga-based stretch class)
